body.name: JOAH Heal Me CICA Gentle Foam Cleanser, Korean Skin Care Face Wash with Centella Asiatica and Camu Camu Extract, Suitable for Sensitive Skin, pH Balanced, Cruelty-Free, 6.76 oz, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 57 mins
features: Gentle Foam Cleanser: Wash the stress away with our calming gentle foam cleanser. Lather up a whipped, cloud-like foam to remove impurities, restore moisture, reboot the skin’s radiance and calm the look of redness without over-stripping the skin barrier

Sensitive Skin’s BFF: The Gentle Foam Cleanser is a dermatologist tested, non-irritating formula that’s perfect for sensitive, combo, or oily skin. Free of allergen components, harmful alcohols, gluten, sulfates, parabens, silicones and fragrances

Packed with benefits: Wash your skin with centella asiatica, a powerful Korean skin care ingredient that reduces redness and restores the skin barrier. The camu camu extract, one of the most antioxidant-rich plants, is known to smooth fine lines and protect skin from environmental damage.

More to Explore From JOAH: Our Korean makeup is created to outperform even the best prestige cosmetic and skin products. Try our full cosmetics and skin care range from eyeliners, lipsticks, foundations through to our skin treatments with premium ingredients.

I Like It Like That: JOAH means, “I Like It” in Korean, because we create our beauty with everything you like in mind. Our effortless Korean Beauty products are cruelty-free, crafted with only good-for-you and high-quality ingredients without the high price tag.
body.description: Crafted with antioxidant-packed camu camu extract and traditional skincare ingredient, centella asiatica, this gentle foaming cleanser purifies skin and soothes the look of redness with a whipped, cloud-like lather. This gentle cleanser has giant benefits. Unleashing the power of centella asiatica, our formula reboots skin’s radiance by removing impurities, restoring moisture and calming redness without over-stripping it. Lather up the whipped, cloud-like foam and get balanced. Our cleanser is dermatologist tested, a non-irritating, whipped foam formula, for all skin types, and free of allergen components, harmful alcohols, gluten, sulfates, parabens, silicones and fragrances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS IS A NICE CLEANSER
reviews.reviewText: THIS IS VERY CLEANSING.NOT OVERLY DRYNG BUT I WOULDNT SAY MOISTURIZING EITHER

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it so far
reviews.reviewText: So, this is definitely a bit of a premature review but, after only having used this twice, I really like it! I do have to say I don't think this would be great for dry skin as it really does get your face clean, not tight clean, but just squeaky clean. I have very oily skin and it gets it squeaky clean, so I tend think this would probably make someone with dry skin's face too tight after washing. In addition to the nice, clean feeling, I also like that this definitely helps with redness! I have NEVER used a cleanser (and I have used MANY) that actually helped redness. That said, I will plan to come back and update this review after I have used the product for a while. I only gave 4 stars for now given I have not used it for any length of time yet, hopefully this will change and I will bump it to 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rescued my skin
reviews.reviewText: Been using Joah Cica Face wash a few months, ran out before I could reorder. Used another brand that gave me a rash on left cheek. Received my shipment, and 2 washes later, my skin is back to normal. Been searching 12yrs for a gentle, but effective face wash that leaces my face feeling soft, fresh, and looking better than ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: Really thick and honestly my face broke out a little more and seemed more greasy after using. But everyones skin is different

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Sue.......thing.Soothing.The name is what caught my attention..."Heal Me" (I need lotsa healing...).This felt really nice, indeed, gentle on my face, almost like I was putting on a moisturizer in the shower.I dispensed about a 2 inch long strip of this into the palm of my hand.The dispense hole is on the smaller side, so it was a narrow bit of strip.The consistency of this white cleanser seemed about as thick as normal (Crest) toothpaste, but instead, it's creamy.I rubbed my palms together vigorously for 10 or so seconds and created a medium level of foam.Like say a 3.5 - 4 on a 10 scale.I applied this to my face and scrubbed (fingers, circular motion), then used one of those vibrating face cleaners with the little silicone bristles.The product felt good; as I said, almost like a moisturizer.No additional/higher level of lather was achieved.I had just finished a 70 lap swim workout in a highly chlorinated public pool.Before doing that, I had applied a REALLY THICK waterproof sunscreen to my face.That sunscreen kind of reminds me of castor oil; seriously, it is thick and extremely waterproof (the whole reason I wear it in that pool).I'm not sure, how good of a job this did in removing that sunscreen.Again, that sunscreen is the most thick and waterproof I have *ever* used.I like this product and my often red cheeks can use the extra pampering this offers.Listen up guys....I thought, well, if this feels as good as it did just as a cleanser, I wonder.....I decided what better to use on sensitive skin as a shave cream, than something like this.I did what I call a "Luxury Shave".Pre shave oil on the face (but not body surface).I dispensed some of this (a little too much; learning curve) into a shave bowl and used a wet badger hair brush, swirling it into the product until it created lather.This created an awesome lather level of foam, using the badger brush.Like say an 8 or 9 on a 10 scale.The shave was comfortable both on the areas that had the pre shave oil and the areas that did not.With the badger brush, the lather just kept going and going.I used a single blade safety razor, which are easy to clean.I say that because, if you use a 5 or whatever, multi blade razor, this, like any rich shave cream will not want to clean out between the blades easily.As much as I like this as a cleanser, I like the pampering and great lather as a shave cream.Works well either way.Nice product, it will be on top of the stack (of the too many products I've ordered and reviewed) considered a great match for me.I hope this review has enabled you to make an informed purchase decision.The combination of how much I like this product and the fact that it is, what I consider a reasonable price, has earned this product an overall 5 star rating.I rarely give an overall 5 star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice facewash not sure it helps acne thou
reviews.reviewText: I am always on the hunt for good facewashes one I can use in the shower and one for at the sink. I am acne prone and normal to dry skin once combo but not since doing skincare as a habit routine. I will say I really like this brand as I have not used the skincare before nor the makeup. I do have a cooling gel mist by this brand that I love I don't even refridgerate it and it gives that cooling sensation everytime. For this face wash a little goes a long way as I think this brand def is good for. The lather is nice too it goes from a cream to a foam depending on how you use it. I like to apply to my face dry and then work it into a lather as I go. I am never disappointed in that at all. For me thou I like to use it at the sink thou it can be messy but it's a nice cleanser and not stripping or drying. However I can't say it does anything for my acne or to worsen it either which I will take but that isn't what I am looking for so for me I will use it but it's not something I will be repurchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Foam face wash
reviews.reviewText: The foam wash does not have any smell, the texture makes it easy to apply to the skin. The only thing is that this foam wash left my skin so dry, and probably not for my skin type ( I have combination skin). Love that the foam wash came in a convenient bottle and seemed big compare to other traditional foam washes so you are definitely getting more product for less money.
